text_en:
This software summarizes all company projects revenues and costs, to easily track them.

Every single bill is submitted to the system, and staff register the working hours they spend in every project, every day. Hourly costs are calculated for everyone.

This way you can see how the company is performing at any time!

It contains a Document Repository for offers, bills and receptions, with automatic pdf generation and mailing between Commercial, Purchasing and Administration departments.
text_es:
Este software resume todos los ingresos y costes de los proyectos de la empresa.

Se registra cada factura, y el personal imputa las horas de trabajo que dedica a cada proyecto, diariamente. Los costes por hora se calculaban para todos. Así se puede ver en todo momento cómo vaa la empresa. Contiene un repositorio de documentos para ofertas, facturas y recepciones, con generación automática de pdf y envío entre los departamentos Comercial, Compras y Administración.

project_en: Competency-Based Training and Assessment for Healthcare Professionals
project_es: Formación y Evaluación por Competencias para Profesionales Sanitarios
text_en: This is a competence-based training portal for health emergency professionals (medics, nurses, ambulance drivers...). They gain competences as they pass exams, and those competences are used to opt to a higher position within their public company.
text_es: Se trata de un portal de formación por competencias para profesionales de emergencias sanitarias (médicos, enfermeros, conductores de ambulancias...). Adquieren competencias a medida que superan exámenes, y esas competencias les sirven para optar a un puesto más alto dentro de su empresa pública

technologies: SQL Server, ASP.NET, Visual Basic, DBNetSuite, Javascript, Meta4
text_en: Software issues solving through a Ticketing System. Corrective, adaptive and evolutionary software maintenance. User support, analysis, implementation and monitoring.

technologies: AUTOCAD, 3D Studio, Swift 3D, Flash MX
text_en: CMAT is an Intelligent Building used for training healthcare personnel, simulating real scenarios through DaVinci robotic surgical system, simulators and others. The buildings lighting, air-conditioning, doors, security cameras, alarms and others are managed using an intuitive software. We developed a 3D User Interface which represents the building and its different areas. The user selects a floor and an area to access to specific controls for the domotics items installed there. You can see and touch one of the prototypes HERE . Click or touch any area of the building! (Flash is needed)
New website for this hospital at Cadiz, Spain. I was the technical responsible in a 4 people team.

project_en: Healthcare Personnel Shift and Payroll Management
project_es: Gestión de Turnos y Nóminas de Personal Sanitario
text_en: Slot allocation for Healthcare personnel, service coverage management, hiring needs, data extraction for payroll calculations, analysis for decision making... They had a system based in Meta4 software, which calculated payrolls based in daily staff dedication to different projects. We made a new system based in the hourly staff dedication. This solved roundings from the previous system, which usually provoked overcosts and multiple claimings from workers. This application saved a lot of money annually to the customer, so we were complimented on several occasions. I began as programmer and promoted to Analyst and technical manager of the project a year later.

technologies: SQL Server, .NET, DBNetSuite, Javascript, SIMS
text_en:
More than five years developing the college Intranet from scratch, to ease Administration tasks. More than 40 different applications, most of them using database information from SIMS (School Information Management System, from Capita), obtained through database server linking.

- Pupils Reports Repository
- Loan of educational books
- Teaching Staff Evaluation
- Ticketing system for IT, Administration and Maintenance Departments
- Pupils absences notifications to parents via email
- Uniform shop POS
- Summer School Management: Activities, fees, charging up...
- Staff personal Ads
- Inventory control using barcoded labels
- Facilities bookings
... and many more!

technologies: Android, Java, Google Cloud Platform, Datastore, MemCache
